verses.verse: <S%H2896>Better<s%> is a <S%H2720>dry<s%> <S%H6595>morsel<s%>, and <S%H7962>quietness<s%> therewith, than an <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> with <S%H7379>strife<s%>. sacrifices: or, good cheer

A <S%H7919>wise<s%> <S%H5650>servant<s%> shall have <S%H4910>rule<s%> over a <S%H1121>son<s%> that causeth <S%H954>shame<s%>, and shall have <S%H2505>part<s%> of the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H251>brethren<s%>.
The fining <S%H4715>pot<s%> is for <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and the <S%H3564>furnace<s%> for <S%H2091>gold<s%>: but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H974>trieth<s%> the <S%H3826>hearts<s%>.
A wicked <S%H7489>doer<s%> giveth <S%H7181>heed<s%> to <S%H205>false<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%>; and a <S%H8267>liar<s%> giveth <S%H238>ear<s%> to a <S%H1942>naughty<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%>.

Whoso <S%H3932>mocketh<s%> the <S%H7326>poor<s%> <S%H2778>reproacheth<s%> his <S%H6213>Maker<s%>: and he that is <S%H8056>glad<s%> at <S%H343>calamities<s%> shall not be <S%H5352>unpunished<s%>. unpunished: Heb. held innocent
<S%H1121>Children's<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> are the <S%H5850>crown<s%> of old <S%H2205>men<s%>; and the <S%H8597>glory<s%> of <S%H1121>children<s%> are their <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

<S%H3499>Excellent<s%> <S%H8193>speech<s%> <S%H5000>becometh<s%> not a <S%H5036>fool<s%>: much less do <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> a <S%H5081>prince<s%>. Excellent: Heb. A lip of excellency lying: Heb. a lip of lying

A <S%H7810>gift<s%> is as a <S%H2580>precious<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of him that <S%H1167>hath<s%> it: whithersoever it <S%H6437>turneth<s%>, it <S%H7919>prospereth<s%>. a precious: Heb. a stone of grace

He that <S%H3680>covereth<s%> a <S%H6588>transgression<s%> <S%H1245>seeketh<s%> <S%H160>love<s%>; but he that <S%H8138>repeateth<s%> a <S%H1697>matter<s%> <S%H6504>separateth<s%> very <S%H441>friends<s%>. seeketh: or, procureth

A <S%H1606>reproof<s%> <S%H5181>entereth<s%> more into a wise <S%H995>man<s%> than an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H5221>stripes<s%> into a <S%H3684>fool<s%>. entereth: or, aweth more a wise man, than to strike a fool an hundred times
An <S%H7451>evil<s%> man <S%H1245>seeketh<s%> only <S%H4805>rebellion<s%>: therefore a <S%H394>cruel<s%> <S%H4397>messenger<s%> shall be <S%H7971>sent<s%> against him.
Let a <S%H1677>bear<s%> <S%H7909>robbed<s%> of her whelps <S%H6298>meet<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%>, rather <S%H408>than<s%> a <S%H3684>fool<s%> in his <S%H200>folly<s%>.
Whoso <S%H7725>rewardeth<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> for <S%H2896>good<s%>, <S%H7451>evil<s%> shall not <S%H4185>depart<s%> <S%H4185><s%> from his <S%H1004>house<s%>.

The <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of <S%H4066>strife<s%> is as when one letteth <S%H6362>out<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>: therefore leave <S%H5203>off<s%> <S%H7379>contention<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> it be <S%H1566>meddled<s%> with.
He that <S%H6663>justifieth<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, and he that <S%H7561>condemneth<s%> the <S%H6662>just<s%>, even they <S%H8147>both<s%> are <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
Wherefore is there a <S%H4242>price<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a <S%H3684>fool<s%> to <S%H7069>get<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, seeing he hath no <S%H3820>heart<s%> to it?
A <S%H7453>friend<s%> <S%H157>loveth<s%> at all <S%H6256>times<s%>, and a <S%H251>brother<s%> is <S%H3205>born<s%> for <S%H6869>adversity<s%>.

A <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H2638>void<s%> of <S%H3820>understanding<s%> <S%H8628>striketh<s%> <S%H3709>hands<s%>, and <S%H6148>becometh<s%> <S%H6161>surety<s%> in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of his <S%H7453>friend<s%>. understanding: Heb. heart
He <S%H157>loveth<s%> <S%H6588>transgression<s%> that <S%H157>loveth<s%> <S%H4683>strife<s%>: and he that <S%H1361>exalteth<s%> his <S%H6607>gate<s%> <S%H1245>seeketh<s%> <S%H7667>destruction<s%>.

He that hath a <S%H6141>froward<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H4672>findeth<s%> no <S%H2896>good<s%>: and he that hath a <S%H2015>perverse<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H5307>falleth<s%> into <S%H7451>mischief<s%>. He that hath a froward: Heb. The froward of heart
He that <S%H3205>begetteth<s%> a <S%H3684>fool<s%> doeth it to his <S%H8424>sorrow<s%>: and the <S%H1>father<s%> of a <S%H5036>fool<s%> hath no <S%H8055>joy<s%>.
A <S%H8056>merry<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> doeth <S%H3190>good<s%> like a <S%H1456>medicine<s%>: but a <S%H5218>broken<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H3001>drieth<s%> the <S%H1634>bones<s%>. like: or, to
A <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man <S%H3947>taketh<s%> a <S%H7810>gift<s%> out of the <S%H2436>bosom<s%> to <S%H5186>pervert<s%> the <S%H734>ways<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment<s%>.
<S%H2451>Wisdom<s%> is before him that hath <S%H6440>understanding<s%> <S%H995><s%>; but the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of a <S%H3684>fool<s%> are in the <S%H7097>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
A <S%H3684>foolish<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> is a <S%H3708>grief<s%> to his <S%H1>father<s%>, and <S%H4470>bitterness<s%> to her that <S%H3205>bare<s%> him.
Also to <S%H6064>punish<s%> the <S%H6662>just<s%> is not <S%H2896>good<s%>, nor to <S%H5221>strike<s%> <S%H5081>princes<s%> for <S%H3476>equity<s%>.

He that <S%H3045>hath<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> <S%H2820>spareth<s%> his <S%H561>words<s%>: and a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H8394>understanding<s%> is of an <S%H3368>excellent<s%> <S%H7119><s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%>. an: or, a cool

Even a <S%H191>fool<s%>, when he holdeth his <S%H2790>peace<s%>, is <S%H2803>counted<s%> <S%H2450>wise<s%>: and he that <S%H331>shutteth<s%> his <S%H8193>lips<s%> is esteemed a man of <S%H995>understanding<s%>.
